# allquiet_outbound_integration (Resource)

OutboundIntegration resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `display_name` (String) The display name of the integration
- `team_id` (String) The team id of the integration

- `id` (String) Id
